title: Google Pixel 3 rear camera not working and unable to contact Google support
content:
Rear camera is not working (focus problem). I reset the Google Pixel 3 Phone, the problem persist. I'm unable to contact Google Germany support center, I receive following error (Phone or Chat):
  As a precautionary health measure for our support specialists in light of COVID-19, we're operating with a limited team. If you need help with a product whose support you had trouble reaching over the phone, consult its product-specific Help Center.
  I tried every day from 07:00 to 19:00 without success, how I can reclaim my fuarantee? I donâ€™t see e-mail option, only Phone or Chat
